content: slouchy hats beanies & berets are always a good idea but when you want to stand out in a crowd gigi s bucket hat is just the ticket **new ** we re thrilled to have our first pattern to appear in two languages now in both korean and english we are very proud to include this additional version a special thank you to amigurumikr 1 for translating this pattern into korean we are so happy you like our hat 1 https //www ravelry com/people/amigurumikr
